5771.quoteText:
Business Transfers

If Nabu Casa, Inc., or substantially all of its assets, were acquired, or in the unlikely event that Nabu Casa, Inc. goes out of business or enters bankruptcy, user information would be one of the assets that is transferred or acquired by a third party. You acknowledge that such transfers may occur, and that any acquirer of Nabu Casa, Inc. may continue to use your personal information as set forth in this policy.
5771.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

5772.quoteText:
Privacy Policy Changes

Although most changes are likely to be minor, Nabu Casa, Inc. may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Nabu Casa, Inc.’s sole discretion. Nabu Casa, Inc. encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.
5772.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

5773.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

5774.quoteText:
Nabu Casa, Inc.
visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using Nabu Casa, Inc.’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of Nabu Casa, Inc.’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.
5774.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

5775.quoteText:
Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

Nabu Casa, Inc. discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on Nabu Casa, Inc.’s behalf or to provide services available at Nabu Casa, Inc.’s websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located outside of your home country. by using Nabu Casa, Inc.’s websites, you consent to the transfer of such information to them.
5775.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties

5778.quoteText:
Aggregated Statistics

Nabu Casa, Inc. may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its websites. For instance, Nabu Casa, Inc. may monitor the most popular component documentation. Nabu Casa, Inc. may display this information publicly or provide it to others.
5778.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

5779.quoteText: From time to time, Nabu Casa, Inc. may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.
5779.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
